title: Quote of the Day on Skeptical Websites About the Shroud ofÂ Turin
post: It is a problem, but there is a greater problem that I have never heard addressed. If you take a curved surface and wrap a plane (i.e. a piece of cloth) around it to take an impression of it, when you flatten it out it warps the image. (Think of a cylinder projection map of the Earth.) If anyone knows of an examination of this issue, please let me know.
author: David
